title: Front-End Web Developer
description:
We are looking for an enthusiastic front-end developer to join the team full-time. This position is for a mid-level Web Developer. Successful candidates must be able to implement custom web designs on a WordPress platform, as well as provide coded HTML and CSS for use on other platforms. This includes integration of 3rd party apps, such as Facebook and Twitter.

Our ideal candidate is located in the **Memphis, TN** area. We are open to considering remote work for exceptional developers.

### Skills & Requirements
Must have experience:

* WordPress theme development
* PHP (general)
* Responsive design
* jQuery
* CSS

Nice to have experience:

* Object-oriented PHP
* MySQL
* Console (bash)
* Version Control (Git)

Exhibit interpersonal skills, such as:
* Excellent written and oral communication skills (English)
* Attention to detail
* The ability to work independently but, also work well within a team environment
howToApply: To apply to our position, please send your resume and GitHub link to [resumes@example.com](mailto:resumes@example.com).
